summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Thorndyke Avenue from a connection with the existing sewer approximately 200 feet north of West Ray Street to West Hayes Street; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8859 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
